IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO MAKE CHARITABLE DONATIONS TO DULY RECOGNIZED TAX EXEMPT INSTITUTIONS WITHIN THE MEANING OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND TO PROVIDE EMERGENCY ASSISTANCE TO BONA FIDE VICTIMS OF DISASTER AND CATASTROPHE AND TO SUPPORT COMMUNITY PROJECTS FOR THE GOOD OF THE GENERAL PUBLIC.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO MAKE CHARITABLE DONATIONS TO DULY RECOGNIZED TAX EXEMPT INSTITUTIONS WITHIN THE MEANING OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND TO PROVIDE EMERGENCY ASSISTANCE TO BONA FIDE VICTIMS OF DISASTER AND CATASTROPHE AND TO SUPPORT COMMUNITY PROJECTS FOR THE GOOD OF THE GENERAL PUBLIC.
IRS990.Desc: TO MAKE CHARITABLE DONATIONS TO DULY RECOGNIZED TAX EXEMPT INSTITUTIONS WITHIN THE MEANING OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND TO PROVIDE EMERGENCY ASSISTANCE TO BONA FIDE VICTIMS OF DISASTER AND CATASTROPHE AND TO SUPPORT COMMUNITY PROJECTS FOR THE GOOD OF THE GENERAL PUBLIC.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: ST FRANCIS FOOD PANTRIES AND SHELTERS

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PLAN IS ADMINISTERED BY TRUSTEES WHO ARE APPOINTED BY THE EMPLOYER ASSOCIATIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: LINE 11B EXPLANATION - FORM 990 IS PREPARED BY ITS INDEPENDENT PUBLIC ACCOUNTANT. THE RETURN IS THEN PRESENTED TO THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES FOR REVIEW AND SIGNATURE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NEW YORK CITY CARPENTERS RELIEF AND CHARITY FUND MONITORS ITS CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ON AN ANNUAL BASIS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NEW YORK CITY CARPENTERS RELIEF AND CHARITY FUND'S BOARD OF TRUSTEES REVIEW COMPENSATION OF ALL EMPLOYEES ON AN ANNUAL BASIS AND VERIFY THAT PERSONS WITH A CONFLICT OF INTEREST WERE NOT INCLUDED IN APPROVAL PROCESS AND DOCUMENT IT IN THE MINUTES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FUND MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST AND TO THE EXTENT REQUIRED BY LAW.
